name: Item Picker
description: Grid/list picker with selection chips, search, and in-place actions.

use: you need a picker for custom items (icons, colors, templates).
you want dialog or popover presentation.

examples.minimal:
ItemPicker<String>(
  items: ItemList(const ['A', 'B', 'C']),
  builder: (context, item, selected) => Text(item),
  onChanged: (value) {},
)

theming: Uses shared dialog/card theming for presentation.
accessibility: Provide labels for items when icons are used.
dont: Present too many items without search or grouping.
